jbrofuzz.fuzz
Class Connection

java.lang.Object
  jbrofuzz.fuzz.Connection

public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object

Description: The class responsible for making the connection for the purposes of fuzzing through the corresponding socket.

This class gets used to establish each sequencial connection being made on a given address, port and for a given request.

Version:
0.1
Author:
subere@uncon.org

Constructor Summary
Connection(java.lang.String address, java.lang.String port, java.lang.String message)
          Implement a connection to a particular address, on a given port, specifying the message to be transmitted.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getReply()
          Return the reply from the Connection that has been made, based on the message that has been transmitted during construction.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
